titles.title: Wool and Mohair Federal Support Program Elimination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993
A bill to eliminate the price support program for wool and mohair, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2224-2226)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9493-9494)

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 3/2/1993--Introduced. Wool and Mohair Federal Support Program Elimination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993 - Repeals the National Wool Act of 1954 (eliminating wool and mohair price supports).
